objectives

		# necessities
		
		[ ] https://www.tradingview.com/v/6w9Jchj6/
		
		[ ] one indicator:
			[ ] pivots 
				# pivot points
			
				[{
					
				},{
					
				}]
			
				[ ] multipliers for pivots
		
			[ ] win-loss multiplier
				
				for example:
					multiplier = 1.341 from date_1 to date_2
	
			proceeds = {
				"symbol": "",			
				"multiplier": "",
			}
		
	
		[ ] combined proceeds
		
			proceeds = {
				"symbol": "",
				"dates": [],

					"name": "RSI",

						}
